Michael Davis

Designer • Innovator • Tech-Enthusiast

Resume
Projects

Me Check

During the PennApps Fall Hackathon I, along with three others, designed a web app that foccused on bringing medical care to remote locations. I designed the front end and programmed the data search algorithm used to find potential diagnosis.

Cluster Pi

During the summeer of 2014, I purchased 3 Raspberry Pi units and build a cluster server to host my web design files. My primary goal for beginning the project was to learn Python while experimenting with Raspberry Pis.

Java Lrn

While working for Lavner Camps, I was asked to help develop a game to teach youth ages 13 to 16 how to program using Java. I worked with one senior member to help design an interactive java-based learning game for the campers.

DDoS + Cloud

I researched the effects and implications of Distrubuted Denial of Service(DDoS) attacks in the cloud. During my senior year of high school I submitted the 4000 word research paper to fufill my IB extended essay requirement.
